DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate efficacy Omega-3 Fatty Acid Supplement improve Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) clinical symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Superiority Omega-3 Versus Placebo Improvement ADHD Children
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , control , randomize , prospective , parallel-group , double-blind study evaluate effect Omega-3 Fatty Acid Supplement EPA , DHA , vitamins E D ADHD clinical symptom ( accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th . edition ( DSM-IV-TR ) criterion ) child 6 11 year . Patients randomize receive either new omega-3 supplement placebo 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Age 6 11 year 11 month .
